svg.text: Key AI Pitfalls: Lessons from Production Systems

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: #333; line-height: 1.8; margin: 0;

div.p: AI models can misread cues when they lack domain-specific knowledge or sufficient contextual data. Without understanding nuanced business rules, industry regulations, or situational factors, AI systems may generate outputs that are technically correct but contextually wrong.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; color: #1a1a1a; margin: 0 0 12px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: Real Example: Tire Warranty Claims

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #444; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: Initial AI models struggled to distinguish between manufacturing defects and user damage without understanding warranty policy context. The 15-20% reassessment rate highlighted how AI missed subtle contextual clues that human inspectors caught.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: #666; margin-top: 10px; font-style: italic;

div.p: — Zaffco Case Study

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: #333; line-height: 1.8; margin: 0 0 15px 0;

div.p: Biased training data produces biased AI systems. Models trained on non-representative datasets will perpetuate and amplify existing inequities, leading to skewed results that fail diverse user populations.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; color: #1a5f1a; margin: 0; font-weight: 600;

div.p: Mitigation: Diverse datasets, bias audits, multi-demographic testing

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; color: #1a1a1a; margin: 0 0 12px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: Real Example: Creative AI Image Generation

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #444; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: Early image generation models produced homogeneous outputs that didn't reflect demographic diversity. The pharmaceutical client required representative imagery across age, ethnicity, and geography. Solution required multi-model orchestration with explicit diversity parameters to overcome training data bias.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: #666; margin-top: 10px; font-style: italic;

div.p: — Creative AI Platform Case Study

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: #333; line-height: 1.8; margin: 0 0 15px 0;

div.p: AI systems excel at finding patterns in training data, but can overfit to historical patterns that no longer apply. This causes models to miss novel situations, edge cases, and emerging trends that don't match past data.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; color: #1a5f1a; margin: 0; font-weight: 600;

div.p: Remedy: Continuous retraining, anomaly detection, human validation for outliers

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; color: #1a1a1a; margin: 0 0 12px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: Real Example: Clinical Trial Intelligence

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #444; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: MIRA's AI initially over-optimized for common trial patterns, causing it to miss breakthrough therapies using novel mechanisms. The 35% intelligence gap stemmed from pattern-matching that filtered out statistically rare but strategically critical trials. Required hybrid approach combining pattern detection with novelty scoring.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: #666; margin-top: 10px; font-style: italic;

div.p: — MIRA Platform Case Study

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 17px; color: #1b5e20; margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: ✓ Human-in-the-Loop Checks

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #2d2d2d; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: Keep domain experts in the decision chain. AI recommends, humans approve. All case studies implemented review workflows before production deployment.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 17px; color: #1b5e20; margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: ✓ Diverse Validation Datasets

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #2d2d2d; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: Test across demographics, regions, and edge cases. Chanakya tested with 500+ users across languages. Creative AI validated across age, ethnicity, and geography.

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 17px; color: #1b5e20; margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-weight: bold;

div.p: ✓ Clear Success Criteria

p.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; color: #2d2d2d; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;

div.p: Define measurable benchmarks before deployment. Tire claims system required 95% accuracy. Content AI needed 95% compliance rate. Track and iterate continuously.

svg.text: Based on real production AI systems across healthcare, insurance, and pharmaceutical industries
